|c|☆Raymond935|Gg
|c|☆Raymond935|Nice prep!
|c|☆jayballester|that was so hard
|c|☆jayballester|After g1 I thoguht I was doomed
|c|☆Raymond935|I thought the match up was pretty advantageous to my draft, corv def impressed me
|c|☆jayballester|Yeah the whole thing relied on corv stopping pao and dnite
|c|☆jayballester|Also my calcs were all wrong cause I though banded E-Speed did 50% max to hatt
|c|☆jayballester|even with word of ruin
|c|☆Raymond935|Got really lucky with outrage G1
|c|☆Raymond935|COulda gone your way easily
|c|☆jayballester|that 50/50 was rough yea
|c|☆Raymond935|I messed up my calcs too
|c|☆Raymond935|ruins are hard
|c|☆jayballester|yeeea
|c|☆Raymond935|My calc was telling me espeed would straight up kill hat turn 1
|c|☆Raymond935|So I didn't crash into it along w espeed
|c|☆Raymond935|Ggs
